title: SMS texts and recent calls didnÂ´t transfer after factory reset
content:
After trying out Android 12 beta, I decided to do a factory reset and go back to Android 11. 
When I logged in with my Google account, it transferred everything but my texts (which are very important) and my recent calls lists. (not that important)
I did remember to backup my SMS, so this is not the issue. 
I have tried to reset 2 times now, and same thing happens.  What to do?
